title: Confession
description: Undying PleasureHarriet had never truly craved physical love--nor had she desired any other man except her husband. Until David de Morrissey swept her away... Brilliant and darkly handsome, he came to her as a confidant to her loneliness. But what begins as a friendship becomes something far more thrilling as she succumbs to the lure of his seductive charms--and discovers erotic delights and hungers unlike any she has known. But when this seducer of her soul reveals his own tormented secret, it is too late--Harriet has already crossed into a realm of uninhibited passions. And nothing can save her now...
author: Lori Herter
